EASTERN SOUTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 01.
1. SURVEY OPERATIONS IN PROGRESS UNTIL
   FURTHER NOTICE BY M/V AMAZON CONQUEROR
   TOWING 12 8000 METER LONG CABLES
   IN AREA BOUND BY
   28-44.00S 012-03.00E, 28-44.00S 013-13.00E,
   30-35.00S 013-40.00E, 30-09.00S 012-30.00E.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 154/24.
